title: noise cancellation for ARTIX Headpones
content: I'm interested in purchasing the CL750 on-ear headphones from your shop. However, I wasn't entirely clear on the noise cancellation capabilities in the product description. Does the CL750 offer Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) technology?
